name: part_011
file: tmp_【#マリン船長の番組】2周年記念に地獄企画いくつかやりました【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [tV0vI7Aflho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Marine teases Aqua about not 'setting sail' (having a romantic encounter). Aqua lies and says she has, but Marine doesn't believe her.
Shion enters and claims she can handle both of them. Aqua tells her to be quiet. Shion accidentally drops a mysterious potion.
Okayu finds and drinks the potion, transforming into a 'handsome boy'. The others are shocked and captivated by her new appearance.
Marine, Aqua, and Shion all start fighting over who Okayu belongs to, while Okayu remains characteristically nonchalant.
Miko enters to apologize to Marine but is thrilled to see her transformation potion worked. The others get annoyed and attack Miko as Okayu leaves to buy food.
A collection of NG scenes (bloopers) from the filming of the 'Hirudora Hololive' series.
Captain Marine's Show title card and transition.
Announcement for the premiere of an original song collaboration between Houshou Marine and Yunomi.
Marine introduces various merchandise items for her 2nd activity anniversary, including canvas art, a pirate flag, and a tie pin.
Final announcement for the 'V no Su-con na Otakatsu nan da wa!' radio show.

subtitles.original: どうせまだ出航もしてないんでしょう〜？？
subtitles.english: You probably haven't even set sail yet, have you??

subtitles.original: っししし...
subtitles.english: Heh heh heh...

subtitles.original: してますけどぉ！？
subtitles.english: I have though!?

subtitles.original: うわ〜www してないんだぁ〜ww
subtitles.english: Wow... she totally hasn't.

subtitles.original: あれぇ〜？？お母さんはもうしましたけど〜？？
subtitles.english: Oh? Mother has already done it, you know?

subtitles.original: 出会って即出航しましたけどぉ〜？？w
subtitles.english: We set sail immediately after meeting!

subtitles.original: このクソBBAアアア！！！
subtitles.english: You shitty old hag!!!

subtitles.original: おいふたりとも、俺サマは複数人同時に攻略出来るから心配するなよ
subtitles.english: Hey you two, don't worry, I can handle multiple people at once.

subtitles.original: うるさい！！シオンは黙ってて！！
subtitles.english: Shut up!! Shion, stay out of this!!

subtitles.original: うわっなんか落としちゃったぁ(棒)
subtitles.english: Whoops, I dropped something. (monotone)

subtitles.original: もぐもぐ... ぺろぺろ...
subtitles.english: Munch munch... lick lick...

subtitles.original: ああああ！！それはみこ部長の作った変な薬！！
subtitles.english: Aaaah!! That's the weird potion Club President Miko made!!

subtitles.original: おかゆ...！！おかゆだめ！！
subtitles.english: Okayu...!! Okayu, no!!

subtitles.original: なによそれ！！
subtitles.english: What is that!?

subtitles.original: おかゆ早く吐きなさい！！
subtitles.english: Okayu, spit it out now!!

subtitles.original: 吐きなさい！！
subtitles.english: Spit it out!!

subtitles.original: もうそれ、ボクで良くない〜？
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine if you just go with me now?

subtitles.original: なんて魅力的なケモミミ美男子(美少女)！？
subtitles.english: What a charming kemomimi handsome boy (beautiful girl)!?

subtitles.original: おかゆがこんなに素敵なケモミミ美男子だったなんて...！！
subtitles.english: I never knew Okayu was such a wonderful kemomimi handsome boy...!!

subtitles.original: もうほかの男なんかどうでもいい！！！
subtitles.english: I don't care about any other guys anymore!!!

subtitles.original: マリン、おかゆと出航したい！！
subtitles.english: Marine wants to set sail with Okayu!!

subtitles.original: いいよ〜
subtitles.english: Sure~

subtitles.original: ダメよ！！元々おかゆはあたしが飼ってたんだから！！
subtitles.english: No way!! I was the one who was keeping Okayu in the first place!!

subtitles.original: おかゆはあたしのよ！！
subtitles.english: Okayu is mine!!

subtitles.original: そうだねぇ〜
subtitles.english: That's true~

subtitles.original: おいなに言ってんだっ！こんな良いケモミミオンナ、俺サマのもんに決まってるだろ！？
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you saying!? A kemomimi girl this good obviously belongs to me!?

subtitles.original: そうとも言えるねぇ
subtitles.english: You could say that too~

subtitles.original: マリンちゃん！！！
subtitles.english: Marine-chan!!!

subtitles.original: 本当に... ごめん、悪かったにぇ！！
subtitles.english: I'm really... sorry, I was wrong!!

subtitles.original: 本当に僕のことを愛してくれていたのは、君だけだったとー
subtitles.english: That the only one who truly loved me was you—

subtitles.original: あれっ、あっ！！
subtitles.english: Huh? Ah!!

subtitles.original: あれ〜〜！？もしかして僕の研究が... 完成していたのか！！
subtitles.english: Wait~~!? Could it be that my research... was actually complete!?

subtitles.original: これは... 僕が大好きなケモミミ美少女だにぇぇぇ！！
subtitles.english: This is... the kemomimi beautiful girls that I love so much!!

subtitles.original: うるせぇクソジジイ！！！
subtitles.english: Shut up, you shitty old man!!!

subtitles.original: おかゆに触ってんじゃねえ！！
subtitles.english: Don't you dare touch Okayu!!

subtitles.original: おにぎり買いに行ってきま〜す
subtitles.english: I'm going to go buy some onigiri~

subtitles.original: 絶対許さないんだから！！
subtitles.english: I'll never forgive you!!

subtitles.original: ひどい... なんでみんなマリンを裏切るの？マリンちゃん、待ってたよ... こんなに尽くしてるのに...
subtitles.english: Terrible... why does everyone betray Marine? Marine-chan was waiting... even though I've done so much for you...

subtitles.original: これ、どこだ...？w
subtitles.english: Where is this...? lol

subtitles.original: くすりw どこだって、なに、どこだって、くすり
subtitles.english: The medicine lol. What do you mean 'where is it', where... the medicine.

subtitles.original: お母さん、あたし自分の部屋掃除してくるから。それまでリビングにシオンちゃんに、お茶... あ、シオンちゃんじゃないか...
subtitles.english: Mother, I'm going to clean my room. Until then, in the living room for Shion-chan, some tea... oh, it's not Shion-chan...

subtitles.original: あ、シオン... あ、ごめん
subtitles.english: Ah, Shion... ah, sorry.

subtitles.original: おかゆがこんなに素敵なケモミミ美男子だったなんて...！！
subtitles.english: I never knew Okayu was such a wonderful kemomimi handsome boy...!!

subtitles.original: もうほとほ...
subtitles.english: Already alm...

subtitles.original: なんて言った？w 略しちゃったw
subtitles.english: What did I say? lol I abbreviated it lol

subtitles.original: マリンちゃん！僕が、悪かったにぇ... あの...
subtitles.english: Marine-chan! I was wrong... um...

subtitles.original: 本当に、ごめん... あにゃ... わんじゃねえわ
subtitles.english: I'm really sorry... anya... wait that's not it.

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン x Yunomi コラボの電子ドラック的オリジナル楽曲。6名の白熱アニメーターさんたちのアニメミュージックビデオに乗せて、このあと22時プレミア公開！
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine x Yunomi collaboration electronic-drug-like original song. With an anime music video by 6 hot animators, it'll have a premiere release at 22:00!

subtitles.original: 1回見ても聴いても理解できない不思議な曲です。君の頭を征服する電子ドラックになりたい。
subtitles.english: It's a strange song that you won't understand even after watching or listening once. I want to be an electronic drug that conquers your head.

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン2周年グッズの告知です！まずは、こちら。キャンバスアートです。
subtitles.english: Announcement for Houshou Marine 2nd anniversary goods! First, this. Canvas art.

subtitles.original: 見てください、この色気溢れる風貌。人目を憚らずジロジロ見るためにも、購入するしかないですね。
subtitles.english: Look at this appearance overflowing with sexiness. To stare at it without worrying about others, you've got no choice but to buy it.

subtitles.original: 続いて、だいぶ前に君たちから提案された海賊旗をついにグッズにしてみました。
subtitles.english: Next, I've finally made the pirate flag that you guys suggested a long time ago into merchandise.

subtitles.original: 部屋に飾ればそれだけで、そう。そこは宝鐘海賊団の船になるのだ。
subtitles.english: If you hang it in your room, just like that, yes. It becomes a ship of the Houshou Pirates.

subtitles.original: そして、こちら。船長がお胸につけているバッジとお揃いのネクタイピンです。
subtitles.english: And this. A tie pin that matches the badge Captain wears on her chest.

subtitles.original: え、ネクタイつけてないよって君も、これを部屋に置いておけば... もう、船長、忘れ物して。と、何かあった一夜を演出できますね。
subtitles.english: Eh, for you who says 'I don't wear a tie,' if you leave this in your room... you can stage a night where 'Oh, Captain, you forgot something.'

subtitles.original: 全部セットでご購入いただきましたらば、こちらのポストカードがついてきます。ポストカード、集めてますよね？目指せ全種コンプ！
subtitles.english: If you purchase the full set, you'll get this postcard. You're collecting postcards, right? Aim for a full completion!

subtitles.original: 以上、グッズ告知でした！
subtitles.english: That's all for the goods announcement!

subtitles.original: はい、最後のお知らせです！船長とフブちゃんのネットラジオ「Vのすこんなオタ活なんだワ！」
subtitles.english: Yes, the last announcement! Captain and Fubuz-chan's net radio 'V no Su-con na Otakatsu nan da wa!'
